Effective Date: Nov 25, 2023
    Modified Date: Nov 25, 2023

    This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which Parity Software, Inc ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, maintains, and discloses information collected from users (each, a "User") of the PRTY.sh mobile application ("App").
Some data is shared with OpenAI to generate responses.
We may collect the following types of information from Users:

The App processes this information to understand User preferences, assist in scheduling, and improve overall user experience.
The primary purpose of collecting calendar and event data is to provide Users with an efficient AI booking assistant service.

In order to fulfill this purpose, the App may access and utilize calendar lists and event data from the User's device and/or account provided exclusively from the Google Calendar (provider) secure API (developer interface).

WE USE COLLECTED INFORMATION
We use the collected information for the following purposes:
  
    2.1 AI Booking Assistant

In order to fulfill this purpose, the App may access and utilize calendar lists and event data from the User's device and/or account provided exclusively from the Google Calendar (provider) secure API (developer interface).

data_type: generic aggregate demographic information not link to personal identification information regard visitor
text: We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers for the purposes outlined above.

4. SHARING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION
We do not sell, trade, or rent Users' personal identification information to others.

data_type: user command relate to calendar management
text: To enhance the AI booking assistant's functionality, the App may collect and process User commands related to calendar and event management.
